participant_1.background:
I like the weather to be a bit cooler so I can enjoy my late night walks and football games.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.
I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
I like to read my favorite books when I have a rainy day.
i am a marathon runner.

participant_2.background:
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.
our class is planning a trip to japan.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.

content.text: I'm so excited for a cooler weather. It'll be nice to have late night walks and football games again!
I'm not too fond of the cold weather. I like to spend time outside and do things like swimming and hiking.
I like to hike too! Have you been to Japan? I hear it's really beautiful there.
I haven't been to Japan, but I would love to go someday! My class is planning a trip there next year and I'm really excited.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to read, run marathons, and go to dance lessons with my boyfriend.
That's cool! I love to read too. I'm not much of a runner, but I do enjoy dancing.
It's a great way to get in shape and have fun at the same time.
I agree! I'm trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
That's great! I'm trying to do the same thing.
I'm not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.
I'm not close to my family either. It's nice to have someone close to you who understands what you're going through.
It really is. My fiance is my best friend and I know I can always count on him.
That's great! I'm glad you have someone like that in your life.
